name: Super Web Kittens: Act I Demo
detailed_description:
THE DEMO

Free Super Web Kittens: Act I demoversion, featuring the first scene of the game. The demo lasts for half an hour and shows what you can expect from the full game.

INFO: You can save your progress and continue playing after buying the full version!

SUPER WEB KITTENS — More about the full game

Super Web Kittens is a visual novel styled game about pets and their owners, living in a dystopian caste-based society.
The game is focused on the distinctive characters, humor and unusual storyline.

short_description: A short part of the short part of the long story, dedicated to the adventures of pets and their owners, living in a cruel dystopian society where intelligent animals with anime eyes have replaced humanity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX and OpenGL compatible videocard
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX and OpenGL compatible videocard
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Latest DirectX and drivers version are recommended
